**Purpose**: IPython extension loader for Rich library pretty printing and traceback formatting within pip's vendored Rich package.

**Core Functionality**:
- `load_ipython_extension(ip: Any)` (L4-10): Entry point function that IPython calls to activate Rich extensions
  - Installs Rich pretty printing via `pip._vendor.rich.pretty.install()` (L9)
  - Installs Rich traceback formatting via `pip._vendor.rich.traceback.install()` (L10)
  - Uses delayed imports (L6-7) to prevent circular dependency issues

**Dependencies**:
- `pip._vendor.rich.pretty`: Provides enhanced pretty printing functionality
- `pip._vendor.rich.traceback`: Provides enhanced traceback formatting
- IPython integration follows standard IPython extension protocol

**Architecture Notes**:
- Follows IPython's extension loading convention with `load_ipython_extension` entry point
- Imports are delayed until function execution to avoid circular imports in vendored package structure
- No cleanup/unload functionality provided (typical for IPython extensions)

**Usage Context**: This enables Rich's enhanced output formatting when pip's vendored Rich is used in IPython/Jupyter environments.
